content.html: Hey tech friends, question for y’all as I’m genuinely curious to understand this ongoing trend in social media bios: ❓Why do you list current and former employers in your bio? ❓What do you want your professional affiliations to signal to folks?
content.value:
Hey tech friends, question for y’all as I’m genuinely curious to understand this ongoing trend in social media bios:

❓Why do you list current and former employers in your bio? 
❓What do you want your professional affiliations to signal to folks?
